name: K.Ajay Kumar Reddy
position: Data Engineer @ Fractal | Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Python
about: With a solid foundation from Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, my journey in tech began as an Internship Trainee at BNP Paribas, quickly transitioning to a Data Engineer role at Fractal. Here, I've honed my skills in Google Cloud Platform (GCP), working on migrating Databases from On-Prem servers to Data Warehouses on the Cloud and building complex pipelines that stream real-time data into databases.

current_company.name: Fractal
current_company.title: Data Engineer @ Fractal | Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Python
